popUp.title: Javascript
popUp.description: A versatile programming language for creating dynamic and interactive web applications

popUp.title: CSS
popUp.description: A style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in HTML or XML.

popUp.title: HTML
popUp.description: The standard markup language for creating and structuring web pages.
popUp.skills: Semantic HTML, Accessibility, SEO, Forms, Media Embedding.

popUp.title: React
popUp.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, especially for single-page applications.
popUp.skills: Component-based architecture, Hooks, State management, Context API.

popUp.title: ThreeJS
popUp.description: A powerful 3D JavaScript library for creating immersive web experiences using WebGL. This is the technology this website is built on combined with React!

popUp.title: PHP
popUp.description: A popular general-purpose scripting language especially suited to web development.
popUp.skills: Server Side Scripting,Form handling, Session management, File manipulation, Data validation, Security best practices.

popUp.title: Java and Spring
popUp.description: A widely-used programming language and framework for building enterprise-level applications.
popUp.skills: Object-oriented programming, RESTful APIs, Dependency injection, Microservices architecture, Data access with JPA.

popUp.title: C# and .NET
popUp.description: A modern programming language and framework developed by Microsoft for building various types of applications.
popUp.skills: Object-oriented programming, LINQ, Asynchronous programming, Web APIs, Microservices architecture.

popUp.title: Relational Databases
popUp.description: Databases that store data in a structured format using rows and columns.
popUp.skills: SQL querying, Data normalization, Transaction management, Data integrity, Indexing.

popUp.title: NodeJS
popUp.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine for building scalable network applications.
popUp.skills: Asynchronous programming, RESTful APIs, Middleware integration, Real-time applications, NPM package management.

popUp.title: MongoDB
popUp.description: A NoSQL database that uses a document-oriented data model for high scalability and flexibility.
popUp.skills: Schema design, Aggregation framework, Indexing, Data modeling, Replication and sharding.

popUp.title: DevOPS
popUp.description: A set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops) to shorten the systems development life cycle.
popUp.skills: Continuous Integration (CI), Continuous Deployment (CD), Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Monitoring and Logging, Collaboration and Communication.

popUp.title: Docker
popUp.description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications inside containers, ensuring consistency across environments.
popUp.skills: Containerization, Microservices architecture, Docker Compose, Docker Swarm, Image management.

popUp.title: Git and Github
popUp.description: Git is a version control system for tracking changes in source code, while GitHub is a cloud-based platform for hosting and collaborating on Git repositories.
popUp.skills: Version control, Branching and merging, Pull requests, Collaboration, CI/CD integration.
